entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -18.7°C
Wind: NNW 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
